reporter_caption.center: SPAHN v. ZONING BOARD OF ADJUSTMENT, 1425 CD 2006 (Pa.Commw. 5-30-2007)

caption.center: Gary Spahn, Appellant v. Zoning Board of Adjustment, The City of
Philadelphia and R.G. Woodstock Associates, LLC. v. Zoning Board of
Adjustment, The City of Philadelphia and R.G. Woodstock Associates, LLC.

opinion.opinion_text: NOW, May 30, 2007, having considered the petition for reargument and reconsideration before the Court en banc filed by Gary Spahn, the application for reargument filed by the City of Philadelphia, and the answers filed by R.G. Woodstock Associates, LLC, the petition and application are denied.Page 1
